trans-unit.source: Represents the abstract base class from which the workflow runtime engine core services are derived.
trans-unit.target: Representerar den abstrakt basklass från vilka kärntjänsterna för arbetsflödet runtime engine hämtas.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Services that derive from the WorkflowRuntimeService class can be started and stopped by the workflow runtime engine.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Tjänster som härleds från klassen WorkflowRuntimeService kan startas och stoppas av workflow runtime engine.

trans-unit.source: The order in which the services are started or stopped, however, is indeterminate, and services may require the support of other services in order to properly initialize themselves when they are started, and, conversely, may require the to support of other services in order to properly shut down when they are stopped.
trans-unit.target: Den ordning som tjänsterna startas eller stoppas, men är obestämt, och tjänster kan kräver stöd för andra tjänster för att initiera sig när de startas och, å andra sidan kan kräva att den till stöd för andra tjänster för att korrekt stängs av när de har stoppats.

trans-unit.source: To address this problem, the workflow runtime engine provides two-phase mechanisms for starting and stopping services.
trans-unit.target: Workflow runtime engine innehåller två faser mekanismer för att starta och stoppa tjänster för att åtgärda problemet.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A> is called, the workflow runtime engine invokes the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A> method for each of its services that derive from the WorkflowRuntimeService class.
trans-unit.target: När <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A>anropas, arbetsflödet runtime engine anropar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A>metoden för var och en av dess tjänster som härleds från klassen WorkflowRuntimeService.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A>

trans-unit.source: After all of these services have been started, the workflow runtime engine raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName> event, which causes the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A> method to be invoked for each workflow runtime engine service.
trans-unit.target: När alla dessa tjänster har startats workflow runtime engine genererar den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName>händelse, vilket gör den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A>metoden anropas för varje arbetsflödestjänsten runtime engine.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Your service can override the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A> method to participate in this two phase process.
trans-unit.target: Tjänsten kan åsidosätta den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A>metod för att delta i den här två steg.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, when <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A> method, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName> event, and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStopped%2A> method provide this two-phase mechanism.
trans-unit.target: På liknande sätt när <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A>anropas, den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A>-metoden i <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName>händelse och <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStopped%2A>metoden tillhandahåller denna mekanism för två faser.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStopped%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A>

trans-unit.source: The State property contains a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState> value that indicates whether the service is in the process of starting or stopping or is completely started or stopped.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen State innehåller en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState>-värde som anger om tjänsten håller på att startas eller stoppas eller är helt igång eller stoppad.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState>

trans-unit.source: Services that derive from the WorkflowRuntimeService class can raise the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> event when they encounter a condition that causes an unhandled exception by calling <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Tjänster som härleds från klassen WorkflowRuntimeService kan utlösa <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>en händelse när de får ett villkor som gör att ett ohanterat undantag genom att anropa <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Services derived from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService> class, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> class, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> class, and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> class ultimately derives from the WorkflowRuntimeService class.
trans-unit.target: Tjänster som härleds från <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService>klassen, de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>klassen, de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService>klass, och <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService>klassen slutligen härleds från klassen WorkflowRuntimeService.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Implementeras i en härledd klass initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.State%2A> is initialized to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.State%2A>initieras till <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, represents the method that will be called when the workflow runtime engine raises the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: När åsidosätts i en härledd klass representerar den metod som ska anropas när workflow runtime engine genererar den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class implements a two-phase starting mechanism so that workflow runtime engine services may perform any initialization that depends on other services after the workflow runtime engine has invoked the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A> method for all of its workflow runtime engine services.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>klassen implementerar en mekanism för två faser Start så att workflow runtime engine-tjänster kan utföra alla initiering som är beroende av andra tjänster när workflow runtime engine har anropats på <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A>metod för alla dess workflow runtime engine-tjänster.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>

trans-unit.source: After the workflow runtime engine has called the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A> method of all of its workflow runtime engine services, it raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Efter workflow runtime engine har anropat den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A>metod för alla dess workflow runtime engine-tjänster den genererar den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName>händelse.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override the OnStarted method to provide any final startup functionality required by your service when the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Du kan åsidosätta OnStarted-metoden för att ge några sista Start-funktioner som krävs av din tjänst när den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName>händelsen utlöses.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The mechanics of subscribing and unsubscribing from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName> event is handled internally.
trans-unit.target: Säkerhetsnivån prenumerera och avslutar prenumerationen av den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName>händelsen hanteras internt.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If your service is added to the workflow runtime engine by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A> after the workflow runtime engine has already been started, the workflow runtime engine will call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A> on your service.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Om din tjänst har lagts till i workflow runtime engine av ett anrop till <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A>när workflow runtime engine har redan startats workflow runtime engine ringer <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A>på din tjänst.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, in this situation, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started> event has already occurred, therefore, your service may have to perform any initialization that it would ordinarily perform in OnStarted from inside the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Men i det här fallet den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started>händelse har inträffat, därför tjänsten kan behöva utföra eventuella initiering den normalt utförs i OnStarted från inuti den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started>

trans-unit.source: You can test <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A> to determine whether the workflow runtime engine has been started.
trans-unit.target: Du kan testa <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A>att avgöra om workflow runtime engine har startats.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.State%2A> is set to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState> before OnStarted is invoked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.State%2A>anges till <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState>innan OnStarted anropas.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of OnStarted performs no action.
trans-unit.target: Standardimplementering av OnStarted inte genomför någon åtgärd.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, represents the method that will be called when the workflow runtime engine raises the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: När åsidosätts i en härledd klass representerar den metod som ska anropas när workflow runtime engine genererar den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class implements a two-phase stopping mechanism so that workflow runtime engine services may retain some functionality after their <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A> method is invoked by the workflow runtime engine in order that they may, if necessary, support the shutdown of other services.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>klassen implementerar en mekanism för två faser stoppas så att workflow runtime engine-tjänster kan behålla vissa funktioner efter deras <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A>metoden anropas av workflow runtime engine så att de kan eventuellt att stöder avstängning av andra tjänster.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>

trans-unit.source: After the workflow runtime engine has called the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A> method of all of its workflow runtime engine services, it raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Efter workflow runtime engine har anropat den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A>metod för alla dess workflow runtime engine-tjänster den genererar den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName>händelse.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override the OnStopped method to provide any final shutdown functionality required by your service when the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Du kan åsidosätta OnStopped-metoden för att ge några sista avstängning funktioner som krävs av tjänsten när den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName>händelsen utlöses.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The mechanics of subscribing and unsubscribing from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName> event is handled internally.
trans-unit.target: Säkerhetsnivån prenumerera och avslutar prenumerationen av den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName>händelsen hanteras internt.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If your <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> is removed from the workflow runtime engine by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.RemoveService%2A> while the workflow runtime engine is running, the workflow runtime engine will call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A> on your service.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Om din <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>tas bort från arbetsflödesmotorn för körning av ett anrop till <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.RemoveService%2A>medan workflow runtime engine körs workflow runtime engine ringer <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A>på din tjänst.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.RemoveService%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>

trans-unit.source: However, in this situation, the OnStopped method will not be called for your service.
trans-unit.target: I det här fallet kommer dock OnStopped-metoden inte anropas för din tjänst.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, your service may have to perform any final shutdown that it would ordinarily perform in OnStopped from inside the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Därför tjänsten kan behöva utföra eventuella slutliga avstängning som det normalt utförs i OnStopped från inuti den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can test <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A> to determine whether the workflow runtime engine is running.
trans-unit.target: Du kan testa <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A>att fastställa om workflow runtime engine körs.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.State%2A> is set to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState> before OnStopped is invoked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.State%2A>anges till <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState>innan OnStopped anropas.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of OnStopped performs no action.
trans-unit.target: Standardimplementering av OnStopped inte genomför någon åtgärd.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genererar den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: Your service can call RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent to raise the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> event when it encounters an exception that it cannot handle during its execution.
trans-unit.target: Tjänsten kan anropa RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent att öka den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>händelsen när den stöter på ett undantag som de inte kan hantera under exekveringen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You should pass the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance associated with the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: Överför du den <xref:System.Guid>av arbetsflödesinstansen som är associerad med ett ohanterat undantag.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: For example, a timer service might pass the <xref:System.Guid> associated with the timer for which the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: Till exempel en tidstjänsten kan skicka den <xref:System.Guid>som är associerade med timer som undantaget uppstod.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The exception that could not be handled.
trans-unit.target: Undantag som inte kunde hanteras.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance associated with the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Guid>av arbetsflödesinstansen som är associerad med ett ohanterat undantag.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> for this service.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref> för den här tjänsten.

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine sets this property before it calls <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A> on the service.
trans-unit.target: Workflow runtime engine anges den här egenskapen innan du anropar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A>på tjänsten.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, starts the service and changes the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.State*> to <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: När åsidosätts i en härledd klass startar tjänsten och ändringar i <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.State*>till <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState"> </xref>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.State*>

trans-unit.source: Start is invoked by the workflow runtime engine on all of its services that derive from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class when <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Starta anropas av arbetsflödet runtime engine på alla tjänster som är härledda från den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>klass när <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A>anropas.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StartRuntime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>

trans-unit.source: Start is also invoked by the workflow runtime engine when a workflow runtime engine service is added to the workflow runtime engine by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A> after the workflow runtime engine has already started.
trans-unit.target: Starta anropas också av workflow runtime engine när ett arbetsflöde runtime engine service har lagts till i workflow runtime engine av ett anrop till <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A>när workflow runtime engine har redan startats.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of Start tracks whether the service has been started and uses this information to throw the appropriate exception if the service is started while it is already running.
trans-unit.target: Standardimplementering av Start spårar om tjänsten har startats och använder informationen för att utlösa lämpliga undantag om tjänsten startas när den körs redan.

trans-unit.source: You can provide additional functionality necessary to have your service started by the workflow runtime engine by overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ange ytterligare funktioner som är nödvändigt att tjänsten startats av workflow runtime engine genom att åsidosätta den här metoden.

trans-unit.source: There is no guarantee about which, if any, services will be running when the workflow runtime engine calls Start on your service.
trans-unit.target: Det finns inga garantier om vilka, eventuella tjänster körs när workflow runtime engine anropar Start på din tjänst.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, in the Start method, you should only perform any initialization that does not depend on functionality provided by other services.
trans-unit.target: Därför i Start-metod bör du endast utföra eventuella initiering som inte är beroende av funktionalitet som tillhandahålls av andra tjänster.

trans-unit.source: This includes functionality provided by core services such as the scheduler service.
trans-unit.target: Detta inkluderar funktionalitet som tillhandahålls av kärntjänster som tjänsten Schemaläggaren.

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName> event after it has called the Start method of all of its workflow runtime engine services.
trans-unit.target: Workflow runtime engine genererar den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName>händelsen när den har anropat metoden Start av alla dess arbetsflöde runtime engine-tjänster.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If your service requires additional initialization after all of the workflow runtime engine services have been started, you can override the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A> method in order to perform this initialization when the Start event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Om tjänsten kräver ytterligare initieringen när alla workflow runtime engine-tjänster har startats, kan du åsidosätta den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A>metoden för att kunna utföra den här initieringen när Start-händelse inträffar.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If your service is added to the workflow runtime engine by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A> after the workflow runtime engine has already been started, the workflow runtime engine will call Start on your service.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Om din tjänst har lagts till i workflow runtime engine av ett anrop till <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A>när workflow runtime engine har redan startats workflow runtime engine ringer Start på din tjänst.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, in this situation, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started> event has already occurred, therefore, your service may have to perform any initialization that it would ordinarily perform in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A> from inside the Start method.
trans-unit.target: Men i det här fallet den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started>händelse har inträffat, därför tjänsten kan behöva utföra eventuella initiering den normalt utförs i <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A>från inuti Start-metoden.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStarted%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started>

trans-unit.source: You can test <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A> to determine whether the workflow runtime engine has been started.
trans-unit.target: Du kan testa <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A>att avgöra om workflow runtime engine har startats.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Start should only be called by the workflow runtime engine.
trans-unit.target: Starta bör endast anropas av workflow runtime engine.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Runtime*> is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) -or- The service has already been started.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Runtime*>är en null-referens (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> i Visual Basic) - eller - tjänsten har redan startats.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Runtime*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar tillståndet för den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class implements two-phase mechanisms for both starting and stopping a workflow runtime engine service.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>klassen implementerar två faser mekanismer för både starta och stoppa en workflow runtime engine tjänsten.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>

trans-unit.source: The first phase of the start mechanism begins when the workflow runtime engine calls the implementation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A> method for the service.
trans-unit.target: Den första fasen av mekanismen för start börjar när workflow runtime engine anropar implementeringen av den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A>metoden för tjänsten.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method should call the base implementation of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A>, which sets State to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState>.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden ska anropa grundläggande implementeringen av <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A>, som anger tillstånd för <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: The second phase occurs after the workflow runtime engine starts all of its workflow runtime engine services when it raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started> event.
trans-unit.target: Den andra fasen inträffar efter workflow runtime engine startar alla dess workflow runtime engine-tjänster när den genererar den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started>händelse.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> internally manages a subscription to this event and its handler will set State to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>internt hanterar en prenumeration på den här händelsen och dess hanterare anger tillstånd till <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>

trans-unit.source: The two-phase mechanism for stopping a workflow runtime engine service begins when the workflow runtime engine calls the implementation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A> method for the service.
trans-unit.target: Två faser mekanism för avbryter en tjänst för workflow runtime engine börjar när workflow runtime engine anropar implementeringen av den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A>metoden för tjänsten.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method should call the base implementation of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A>, which sets State to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState>.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden ska anropa grundläggande implementeringen av <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A>, som anger tillstånd för <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Stop%2A>

trans-unit.source: After it has stopped all of its workflow runtime engine services, the workflow runtime engine raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped> event.
trans-unit.target: När den har stannat alla dess workflow runtime engine-tjänster, workflow runtime engine genererar den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped>händelse.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> internally manages a subscription to this event and its handler will set State to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>internt hanterar en prenumeration på den här händelsen och dess hanterare anger tillstånd till <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: En av de <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState"> </xref> värden.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, stops the service and changes the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.State*> to <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: När åsidosätts i en härledd klass stoppar tjänsten och ändringar i <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.State*>till <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeServiceState"> </xref>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.State*>

trans-unit.source: Stop is invoked by the workflow runtime engine on all of its services that derive from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class when <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Stoppa anropas av arbetsflödet runtime engine på alla tjänster som är härledda från den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>klass när <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A>anropas.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>

trans-unit.source: Stop is also invoked by the workflow runtime engine when a workflow runtime engine service is removed from the workflow runtime engine by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.RemoveService%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Stoppa anropas också av workflow runtime engine när ett arbetsflöde runtime engine service tas bort från arbetsflödesmotorn för körning av ett anrop till <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.RemoveService%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.RemoveService%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of Stop tracks whether the service has been started and uses this information to throw the appropriate exception if the service is stopped before it is started.
trans-unit.target: Standardimplementering av stoppa spårar om tjänsten har startats och använder informationen för att utlösa lämpliga undantag om tjänsten stoppas innan den startas.

trans-unit.source: You can provide additional functionality necessary to have your service stopped by the workflow runtime engine by overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ange ytterligare funktioner som du har tjänsten stoppats av workflow runtime engine genom att åsidosätta den här metoden.

trans-unit.source: There is no guarantee about which, if any, services will be stopped or running when Stop is called on your service.
trans-unit.target: Det finns inga garantier om vilka, om sådant finns, services kommer att stoppas eller körs när stoppa anropas på din tjänst.

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName> event after it has called the Stop method of all of its workflow runtime engine services.
trans-unit.target: Workflow runtime engine genererar den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName>händelsen när den har anropat metoden Stop hos alla dess arbetsflöde runtime engine-tjänster.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Your service may need to retain some residual functionality to support other services until all the workflow runtime engine services have had their stop methods invoked by the workflow runtime engine.
trans-unit.target: Tjänsten kan behöva behålla alla kvarvarande funktioner för att stödja andra tjänster tills alla workflow runtime engine tjänster har haft stoppa metoderna anropas av workflow runtime engine.

trans-unit.source: If your service must retain such functionality, you can override the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStopped%2A> method to perform any additional action required to finish stopping your service when the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Om din tjänst måste behålla dessa funktioner, kan du åsidosätta den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStopped%2A>metod för att utföra ytterligare åtgärder krävs för att slutföra stoppar tjänsten när den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName>händelsen utlöses.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStopped%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If your <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> is removed from the workflow runtime engine by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.RemoveService%2A> while the workflow runtime engine is running, the workflow runtime engine will call Stop on your service.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Om din <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>tas bort från arbetsflödesmotorn för körning av ett anrop till <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.RemoveService%2A>medan workflow runtime engine körs workflow runtime engine anropar stoppa i din tjänst.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.RemoveService%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>

trans-unit.source: However, in this situation, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStopped%2A> method will not be called for your service.
trans-unit.target: Men i det här fallet den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStopped%2A>metoden inte anropas för din tjänst.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStopped%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, your service may have to perform any additional shutdown functionality that it would ordinarily perform in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStopped%2A> from inside the Stop method.
trans-unit.target: Därför tjänsten kan behöva utföra ytterligare avstängning funktioner som det normalt utförs i <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStopped%2A>från inuti Stop-metoden.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.OnStopped%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can test <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A> to determine whether the workflow runtime engine is running.
trans-unit.target: Du kan testa <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A>att fastställa om workflow runtime engine körs.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.IsStarted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Stop should only be called by the workflow runtime engine.
trans-unit.target: Stoppa bör endast anropas av workflow runtime engine.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Runtime*> is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Runtime*>är en null-referens (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> i Visual Basic).</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.Runtime*>

trans-unit.source: -or- The service has not yet been started.
trans-unit.target: - eller - tjänsten har inte startats ännu.
